de.javakaffee.web.msm
Class SessionIdFormat

java.lang.Object
  de.javakaffee.web.msm.SessionIdFormat

public class SessionIdFormat
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines the session id format: It creates session ids based on the original session id and the memcached id, and it extracts the session id and memcached id from a compound session id.

The session id is of the following format: [^-.]+-[^.]+(\.[\w]+)?

Method Detail

createSessionId

public java.lang.String createSessionId(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                        java.lang.String memcachedId)
Create a session id including the provided memcachedId.

Parameters:
sessionId - the original session id, it might contain the jvm route
memcachedId - the memcached id to encode in the session id, may be null.
Returns:
the sessionId which now contains the memcachedId if one was provided, otherwise the sessionId unmodified.

createNewSessionId

public java.lang.String createNewSessionId(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                           java.lang.String newMemcachedId)
Change the provided session id (optionally already including a memcachedId) so that it contains the provided newMemcachedId.

Parameters:
sessionId - the session id that may contain a former memcachedId.
newMemcachedId - the new memcached id.
Returns:
the sessionId which now contains the new memcachedId instead the former one.

changeJvmRoute

public java.lang.String changeJvmRoute(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                       java.lang.String newJvmRoute)
Change the provided session id (optionally already including a jvmRoute) so that it contains the provided newJvmRoute.

Parameters:
sessionId - the session id that may contain a former jvmRoute.
newJvmRoute - the new jvm route.
Returns:
the sessionId which now contains the new jvmRoute instead the former one.

isValid

public boolean isValid(java.lang.String sessionId)
Checks if the given session id matches the pattern [^-.]+-[^.]+(\.[\w]+)?.

Parameters:
sessionId - the session id
Returns:
true if matching, otherwise false.

extractMemcachedId

public java.lang.String extractMemcachedId(java.lang.String sessionId)
Extract the memcached id from the given session id.

Parameters:
sessionId - the session id including the memcached id and eventually the jvmRoute.
Returns:
the memcached id or null if the session id didn't contain any memcached id.

extractJvmRoute

public java.lang.String extractJvmRoute(java.lang.String sessionId)
Extract the jvm route from the given session id if existing.

Parameters:
sessionId - the session id possibly including the memcached id and eventually the jvmRoute.
Returns:
the jvm route or null if the session id didn't contain any.

stripJvmRoute

public java.lang.String stripJvmRoute(java.lang.String sessionId)
Remove the jvm route from the given session id if existing.

Parameters:
sessionId - the session id possibly including the memcached id and eventually the jvmRoute.
Returns:
the session id without the jvm route.
